channel.title: cnn on Progmatix 21
channel.description: Recent content in cnn on Progmatix 21

item.title: Speech Command Classifier
item.description: A template workflow with stable data trifurcation, custom loader with multi-level augmentation, CNN with variable learning rate and early stopping followed by the last mile decoding of the softmax output, and of course, evaluation.

item.title: Text Classification Using Keras LSTM, CNN and embeddings
item.description: Exploiting the temporal and spatial aspects of text for classification is easy.
